products.name: Pool Party Pack
products.joke:
Today a man knocked on my door and asked for a small donation towards the local swimming pool. 
 I gave him a glass of water. 
 Donate something better for your summer pool party with the Pool Party Pack!
products.description: Everything you need to start a party. Friends not included.

products.name: Scrub Dubby Deal
products.joke:
Quarantine Tip #19: Yesterday I ran out of soap and body wash and all I could find was dish detergent. 
 Then it Dawned on me. 
 Never run out of soap with this deal!
products.description: Clean up nicely with this deal.

products.name: Coolest Cooler Steal
products.joke: When building the coolest computer consider our CPU cooler! Keep your CPU cooler with our 200 CFC CPU cooler.
products.description: Be blown away by the savings of this chill deal.

products.name: Rubber Ducky Deal
products.joke:
Rubber duckie you're the one. 
 You make bath time lots of fun 
 Rubber duckie I'm awfully fond of you 
 Rubber duckie joy of joys 
 When I squeeze you, you make noise 
 Rubber duckie you're my very best friend it's true.

products.name: Truckload of Toilet Paper
products.joke: Why did the toilet paper act so cool? Because it was on a roll.
products.description: You will never run out. One day shipping. Dropped in your front yard.
